item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2021
item.description:
I will present DAMON/DAMOS in KernelSummit'21. The title of the talk is “Writing a fine-grained access pattern-oriented lightweight kernel module using DAMON/DAMOS in 10 minutes”.

https://linuxplumbersconf.org/event/11/contributions/984/

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2020
item.description: My talk proposal to the Linux Kernel Summit of this year which is co-located with the Linux Plumbers Conference has accepted! Hope to (virtually) see you there. The title of the talk is, “DAMON: Data Access Monitoring Framework for Fun and Memory Management Optimizations”.

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2019
item.description: My talk proposal to the Linux Kernel Summit of this year which is co-located with the Linux Plumbers has accepted! Hope to see you in Lisbon. The title of the talk is, “Tracing Data Access Pattern with Bounded Overhead and Best-effort Accuracy”.
